Articles.Content:
Well, not hidden per say, but they've been retracted. In bot the VAB and flight screens this happens. And in the flight screen, on interior overlay, if you extend the tweakable options all of the crew's models disappear. The game says they're their, but I can't enter IVA view, and the models don't show up in the corner portraits. In general, this bug is annoying. And it didn't happen until I installed mods. I'm on KSP 1.12.5, and I'll share my .log file. Can anyone figure out how to fix this?

Here's a picture

Edited March 19, 2023 by Kerbalsaurus
Couldn’t figure out how to share the .log
